questions.questionText: To do anything, I first need other people's approval.
I feel I am a person of worth.
I have trouble taking critisim from other people.
I learn and grow from my mistakes rather than deny them or use them to confirm my unworthiness.
I feel of equal value to other people, regardless of my Performance , Looks, IQ, Achievements, Possession (lack of them)
I see myself as serious and thougtful.
I tend to avoid challenging tasks.
I give up on works before completing them.
I tend to focus on negative outcome or personal failure more often.
I can usually handle whatever comes my way.
When I make plans I am certain I can make them work.
Failure makes me work harder.
I am as good as I want to be at making new friends.
I have as many close friends as I would like to have.
I feel good about how well I get along with others.
I wish my friends liked me more than they do.
I feel good about how much my friends like my ideas.
I feel ok about how much other people like doing things with me.
I like to diet not for looking slim, but to stay healthy and nourished.
Other's opinions of my physical appearance is important to me.
I desperately want to change the way that I look.
I often compare my appearance to others or check my appearance in mirrors.
I spend more time thinking about what I dislike about my appearance, then what I like about it.
I feel happy all the day whenever I am satisfied with my look.
I am hesitant to try new things fearing that I might make a mistake.
I have really high standards set for myself and others.
I don't let myself feel uncomfortable around successful people.
I feel that I have a number of good qualities that I am proud of.
I am comfortable in dating a more attractive person than me.
I can handle myself even without the support of others(family,friends etc)

paraList.0_10: You are a Builder. You enjoy leading, creating and working hard. You are a traditional person with respect for authority. Your strengths are your diligence, directness and practicality. Your weaknesses are your lack of tact, patience, and difficulty with abstractions.
paraList.11_20: You are a Planner. You enjoy dreaming, plotting and innovating. You tend to spend a lot of time thinking. Your strengths are your vision, objectiveness and attention to detail. Your weaknesses are your difficulty in putting yourself in the current moment and lack of practicality and speed.
paraList.21_30: You are an Adventurer. You enjoy action, excitement and drama. You easily accept change and are spontaneous. Your strengths are your tenacity, fearlessness and adaptability. Your weaknesses are your carelessness and lack of focus and diligence.
